item.title: I am Yujuan
item.description: Hey hey, this is Yujuan! Thanks for checking out my personal website. ðŸ™‚ I’m currently a software engineer @Tripadvisor based in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. This blog is where I share mainly my professional life, and also some random stuff in life time to time.
